title: crash if vector is mutated while iterating
body:
```
fn main() {                                                                                                                                                    
    let mut a = [0, 1, 2, 3];                                                                                                                                  
    let b = vec::filter(a) {|c|                                                                                                                                
        a = [];                                                                                                                                                
        true                                                                                                                                                   
    };                                                                                                                                                         
}  
```
